content:
# My inventory currently contains only 10 coal, which means I have no other items available for crafting or building.
# 
# To expand my production capabilities, I will need to gather more resources, specifically iron plates and potentially other materials for crafting new entities.
# 
# Since the stone furnace is actively smelting iron ore, I will wait a bit longer to see how many more iron plates it produces before considering my next steps.

sleep(10)  # Wait for 10 seconds to allow the furnace to continue smelting.
print(f"Entities on the map: {get_entities()}")  # Check the status of entities after waiting.
